content.prompt: The third paragraph was most likely intended to argue in favor of which of the following?

choices.label: The establishment of the principle that a rulerâ€™s religion determines the religion of his subjects
The growth of a Protestant religious revival movement in German-speaking lands
The view that religious belief was a private rather than a public matter
The replacement of traditional forms of religion by a universal worship of reason

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
